_header: Saint Christina was a maid bright
_description: William Paris, Life of St. Christina — sixty-six 8-line stanzas

BLAru168.First Lines:
Seynte cristyn was a maide bryghteAs clerkis in bokes hath rede
                    & seen…
BLAru168.Last Lines:
…To se the site there in thi blissewith seint cristyn þi
                    maydyne bright
BLAru168.Attributed Title:
Explicit vita Sancte Cristine virginis Amen (f.
                    4vb)
BLAru168.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Sammlung altenglischer Legenden.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1878: 183-90.
